problem.markdown:
1. In double bus�bar system ,there is a provision of a bus-bar coupling switch for transferring operation from one bus-bar to another _________
(x) True () False
2. The ratio of secondary induced emf to primary induced emf is known as ___________
() Current ratio (x) Voltage transform ratio () Power ratio () All
3. _________ is a device which is used to switch from one bus to the other without any interruption in power supply and without creating hazardous arcs.
() Isolator () Any of the them (x) Bus coupler () Circuit breaker
4. The transformer works on principle of ___________.
() Self-induction () Both Self-induction and Mutual induction (x) Mutual induction
5. Instrument Transformer are used because
() It is cheap () It provides more safety (x) It provides more safety and It is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits () It is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits
problem.p: 1. In double bus�bar system ,there is a provision of a bus-bar coupling switch for transferring operation from one bus-bar to another _________
2. The ratio of secondary induced emf to primary induced emf is known as ___________
3. _________ is a device which is used to switch from one bus to the other without any interruption in power supply and without creating hazardous arcs.
4. The transformer works on principle of ___________.

choicegroup.choice: It provides more safety and It is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits
It is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits
